title: Disruptors, collaborators, red jersey contenders? UAE Emirates can still shake the Vuelta a España
content:
Evenepoel hinted at partnership with Soler, Almeida, Ayuso – but UAE Emirates could prove just as much an enemy as a friend.

Read the full article at Disruptors, collaborators, red jersey contenders? UAE Emirates can still shake the Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
